title: Warden's position in the Rack Stack
body:
Currently middleware.use is adding Warden::Manager to the Stack as you can see here: http://github.com/plataformatec/devise/blob/v1.1.rc1/lib/devise/rails.rb#L9 This appends it to the very end of the Rack chain. But I have Metal Middleware, which would like to use the env['warden']. So I need to fix Warden's position with this code in my application.rb: 
module MyApp
  class Engine < ::Rails::Engine
    initializer "fixing Warden's position in the Rack stack" do |app|
      app.config.middleware.delete Warden::Manager
      app.config.middleware.insert_after(ActionDispatch::Session::CookieStore, Warden::Manager) do |config|
        Devise.warden_config = config
        config.failure_app   = Devise::FailureApp
        config.default_scope = Devise.default_scope
      end
    end
  end
end
Here: http://wiki.github.com/hassox/warden/setup it says that the earliest possible position is after the session rack. That's why in Rails 3 I put it right after ActionDispatch::Session::CookieStore. It works fine for me now. So this is a feature request to make this more flexible :) Thank you for this incredible gem! I am so fond of it.
